com.percussion.services.content.data
Class PSItemSummary

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.services.content.data.PSItemSummary
Direct Known Subclasses:
PSSearchSummary
public class PSItemSummary
extends Object

Represents a content object which is currently an item or folder.

Nested Class Summary
static class PSItemSummary.ObjectTypeEnum
          The enumeration of all supported object types.
static class PSItemSummary.OperationEnum
          The enumeration of all supported item operations.

protected  int contentTypeId
          The content type id.
protected  String contentTypeName

protected  String name
          The item name, the sys_title for items, the folder name for folders, never null or empty.
protected  PSItemSummary.ObjectTypeEnum objectType
          The object type, never null.
protected  Collection<PSItemSummary.OperationEnum> operations
          The allowed operations for this item, never null, may be empty.
protected  int revision
          The revision id.
